name: biomni-get-hpo-names
title: Biomni: Get Hpo Names
description: Retrieve human-readable names and descriptions for Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) term identifiers.
content:
Overview

Converts HPO term IDs into their corresponding human-readable names and descriptions. The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) provides a standardized vocabulary of phenotypic abnormalities encountered in human disease, essential for clinical genomics and rare disease research.

Input Parameters

  • hpo_terms (list of strings, required): List of HPO term identifiers (e.g., ["HP:0001234", "HP:0005678"])
  • data_lake_path (string, optional): Path to local HPO data files if using cached data

Biological Use Case

Critical for clinical genomics workflows where phenotype data is used to prioritize candidate disease genes. Researchers and clinicians use HPO terms to standardize patient phenotype descriptions, enabling computational analysis of genotype-phenotype relationships, disease diagnosis, and variant interpretation in exome/genome sequencing studies.

Output

Returns a parameters (hpo_names.json) containing a mapping of HPO term IDs to their names, definitions, synonyms, and hierarchical relationships within the ontology. Includes parent-child term relationships and additional metadata.

Category
